API Documentation

Code Snippets Module

Collection of code examples demonstrating various algorithms and data operations.

This module contains implementations of sorting algorithms and data manipulation examples using pandas and numpy.

module_2.code_snippets.bubble_sort(arr)[source]

Sort an array using the bubble sort algorithm.

Parameters:

arr (list) – The input array to be sorted.

Returns:

The sorted array in ascending order.

Return type:

list

module_2.code_snippets.process_weather_data(filename='weather.csv')[source]

Process weather data from a CSV file.

Parameters:

filename (str, optional) – Path to the CSV file containing weather data. Default is ‘weather.csv’.

Returns:

A tuple containing numpy arrays of wind_speed, wind_direction, and wind_direction in radians.

Return type:

tuple

Raises:

FileNotFoundError – If the specified file cannot be found.
